content: You're right! The platypus is already a formidable animal in its own right, with its venomous spurs and unique bill. Despite its small size, it can be a formidable opponent to potential predators or threats. As an expert, I would like to remind you that platypuses are not typically aggressive towards humans, but they can become defensive if provoked or threatened. It's always best to observe them from a safe distance to avoid any risk of harm to either you or the animal.
